column4: can someone please help me? I have a problem with ubuntu. Whenever I try to download a new package from synaptic it gives me this error. Same when I use the update manager. sudo apt-get install -f
that last part was meant to say "sudo apt-get install -f" didn't work
Please post your sources.list , but also answer the question, have you ever tried to use automatix or envy.  Both are bad ideas...
